root: ^I- I don't know. The lights suddenly went out and then...
^And then you heard the strange noises.
^Okay, well, come into the light so we can get out of here. It's not safe here.
^Into the light? I... don't think that's going to be possible.
^I mean... thank you for saving me from this prison.
^Dad... wait, what is going on? What prison?
